app.name: PDF Manipulator
app.description: A modern web application for PDF file manipulation

dashboard.title: PDF Tools Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Upload a PDF file to get started with our powerful PDF manipulation tools.

upload.title: Upload your PDF file
upload.subtitle: Drag and drop your PDF file here, or click to browse

merge.title: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document
merge.pageSubtitle: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document
merge.dragToReorder: Drag files to reorder them. The PDFs will be merged in the order shown below.
merge.mergeCompleteDesc: Your PDFs have been successfully merged into a single document.

steps.step1: Upload two or more PDF files using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Arrange the files in the desired order using the up and down arrows.
steps.step3: Click the "Merge PDFs" button to combine the files.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download the merged PDF file.

tips.title: Tips:
tips.tip1: The PDFs will be merged in the order shown in the list.
tips.tip2: You can merge up to 20 PDF files at once with a free account.
tips.tip3: Maximum file size: 10MB per file (free account).

split.title: Split PDF
split.description: Divide your PDF into multiple separate documents
split.pageSubtitle: Divide your PDF into multiple separate documents
split.pageRangeDesc: Specify page ranges separated by commas (e.g., 1-3, 5-8)
split.intervalDesc: Split the PDF into separate files every N pages
split.extractAll: Extract all pages as separate files
split.splitCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully split into multiple files.

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2a: Page Range: Split into specific page ranges
steps.step2b: Split by Interval: Split every N pages
steps.step3: Configure the split options based on your selected method.
steps.step4: Click the "Split PDF" button to process the file.
steps.step5: Once processing is complete, download the split PDF files.

edit.title: Edit PDF
edit.description: Modify text, images, and other content in your PDF files
edit.pageSubtitle: Modify text, images, and other content in your PDF files
edit.textPlaceholder: Select text in the PDF preview to edit it here
edit.imageDesc: Select an image in the PDF preview to replace or remove it, or add a new image at the cursor position.
edit.annotationDesc: Select text in the PDF preview to highlight it or add a comment, or add a freeform annotation.
edit.editCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully edited.

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Navigate through the pages using the Previous and Next buttons.
steps.step3: Use the tabs to access different editing tools:
steps.step3a: Text: Edit text content in the PDF
steps.step3b: Images: Add, replace, or remove images
steps.step3c: Annotations: Add highlights, comments, or other annotations
steps.step4: Make your desired changes to the PDF content.
steps.step5: Click the "Save Changes" button to apply your edits.
steps.step6: Once processing is complete, download the edited PDF file.

edit.noteDesc: PDF editing capabilities may vary depending on the structure of the PDF file. Some PDFs, especially scanned documents or those with security restrictions, may have limited editing options.

delete.title: Delete Pages
delete.description: Remove specific pages from your PDF document
delete.pageSubtitle: Remove specific pages from your PDF document
delete.deleteCompleteDesc: Pages have been successfully removed from your PDF.
delete.howTo: How to Delete Pages from PDF Files

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Specify which pages you want to delete using the page range field.
steps.step3: Click the "Delete Pages" button to process the file.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download the modified PDF file.

tips.title: Tips:
tips.tip1: You can specify individual pages (e.g., 1,3,5) or page ranges (e.g., 2-4).
tips.tip3: You can preview the document to confirm which pages to delete.

extractImages.title: Extract Images
extractImages.description: Extract all images from your PDF document
extractImages.pageSubtitle: Extract all images from your PDF document
extractImages.pageRangeDesc: Specify pages to extract images from (leave empty for all pages)
extractImages.minSizeDesc: Ignore images smaller than this size (in pixels)
extractImages.extractCompleteDesc: Images have been successfully extracted from your PDF.
extractImages.howTo: How to Extract Images from PDF Files

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Specify which pages to extract images from (optional).
steps.step3: Choose the desired image format and minimum size.
steps.step4: Click the "Extract Images" button to process the file.
steps.step5: Once processing is complete, download the extracted images.

extractImages.noteDesc: The quality of extracted images depends on how they were originally embedded in the PDF. Vector graphics may not extract properly.

extractText.title: Extract Text
extractText.description: Extract all text content from your PDF document
extractText.pageSubtitle: Extract all text content from your PDF document
extractText.pageRangeDesc: Specify pages to extract text from (leave empty for all pages)
extractText.preserveLayoutDesc: Attempt to maintain the original text positioning and formatting
extractText.extractCompleteDesc: Text has been successfully extracted from your PDF.
extractText.howTo: How to Extract Text from PDF Files

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Specify which pages to extract text from (optional).
steps.step3: Choose the desired text format and layout options.
steps.step4: Click the "Extract Text" button to process the file.
steps.step5: Once processing is complete, preview the text and download it.

extractText.noteDesc: Text extraction works best with PDFs that contain actual text. Scanned documents may require OCR processing for accurate text extraction.

compress.title: Reduce File Size
compress.description: Compress your PDF to reduce its file size
compress.pageSubtitle: Compress your PDF to reduce its file size while maintaining readability
compress.imageQualityDesc: Lower image quality results in smaller file size
compress.compressCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully compressed.
compress.howTo: How to Reduce PDF File Size

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step3: Adjust the image quality slider if needed.
steps.step4: Choose which elements to remove for additional size reduction.
steps.step5: Click the "Compress PDF" button to process the file.
steps.step6: Once processing is complete, download the compressed PDF file.

compress.noteDesc: Higher compression levels may affect the quality of images and text in your PDF. For documents with many images, reducing image quality will have the greatest impact on file size.

addWatermark.title: Add Watermark
addWatermark.description: Add text or image watermarks to your PDF
addWatermark.pageSubtitle: Add text or image watermarks to your PDF document
addWatermark.opacityDesc: Lower opacity makes the watermark more transparent
addWatermark.pageRangeDesc: Specify pages to add watermark (leave empty for all pages)
addWatermark.watermarkCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully watermarked.
addWatermark.howTo: How to Add Watermarks to PDF Files

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Choose between text or image watermark.
steps.step3a: For text: Enter text, select font, size, and color
steps.step3b: For image: Upload an image and set opacity
steps.step4: Select the position and rotation of the watermark.
steps.step5: Specify which pages to add the watermark to (optional).
steps.step6: Click the "Add Watermark" button to process the file.
steps.step7: Once processing is complete, download the watermarked PDF file.

exportPng.title: Export to PNG
exportPng.description: Convert PDF pages to PNG images
exportPng.pageSubtitle: Convert your PDF pages to high-quality PNG images
exportPng.pageRangeDesc: Specify pages to convert (leave empty for all pages)
exportPng.resolutionDesc: Higher resolution results in larger, more detailed images
exportPng.exportCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully converted to PNG images.
exportPng.howTo: How to Export PDF to PNG

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step3: Select the desired resolution and color mode.
steps.step4: Choose whether to make the background transparent.
steps.step5: Click the "Export to PNG" button to process the file.
steps.step6: Once processing is complete, download the PNG images.

exportJpg.title: Export to JPG
exportJpg.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG images
exportJpg.pageSubtitle: Convert your PDF pages to JPG images
exportJpg.pageRangeDesc: Specify pages to convert (leave empty for all pages)
exportJpg.resolutionDesc: Higher resolution results in larger, more detailed images
exportJpg.qualityDesc: Higher quality results in larger file size
exportJpg.exportCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully converted to JPG images.
exportJpg.howTo: How to Export PDF to JPG

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step3: Select the desired resolution, quality, and color mode.
steps.step4: Choose a background color if needed.
steps.step5: Click the "Export to JPG" button to process the file.
steps.step6: Once processing is complete, download the JPG images.

nup.title: Multiple Pages Per Sheet
nup.description: Arrange multiple PDF pages on a single sheet
nup.pageSubtitle: Arrange multiple PDF pages on a single sheet to save paper when printing
nup.borderDesc: Add a border around each page
nup.pageRangeDesc: Specify pages to include (leave empty for all pages)
nup.createCompleteDesc: Your multi-page layout PDF has been successfully created.
nup.howTo: How to Create Multiple Pages Per Sheet

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Select how many pages you want per sheet.
steps.step3: Choose the page order and orientation.
steps.step4: Adjust margins and border settings if needed.
steps.step6: Click the "Create PDF" button to process the file.
steps.step7: Once processing is complete, download the new PDF file.

nup.noteDesc: This tool is ideal for creating handouts, booklets, or saving paper when printing documents. The original PDF is not modified.

auth.title: PDF Manipulator
auth.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.name: Name

history.title: Usage History
history.subtitle: View and manage your PDF manipulation history

docs.title: Documentation
docs.userManualDesc: Learn how to use our PDF manipulation tools effectively
docs.apiDocsDesc: Technical documentation for integrating with our PDF API
docs.welcomeDesc: PDF Manipulator is a powerful web application that allows you to perform various operations on PDF files. This guide will help you get started with the application and make the most of its features.

quickStartSteps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the drag-and-drop area or file browser on the dashboard.
quickStartSteps.step2: Select the operation you want to perform from the available tools.
quickStartSteps.step3: Configure the operation settings as needed.
quickStartSteps.step4: Click the "Process" button to perform the operation.

docs.accountManagementDesc: To access all features of PDF Manipulator, you need to create an account. Once logged in, you can:

accountFeatures.feature1: Save your PDF files for future use
accountFeatures.feature3: Generate API keys for programmatic access

faqQuestions.a1: Yes, all uploaded files are encrypted and automatically deleted after processing unless you choose to save them to your account.
faqQuestions.q2: What file size limits are there?
faqQuestions.a2: Free accounts can upload files up to 10MB. Premium accounts can upload files up to 100MB.
faqQuestions.q3: Can I use the application offline?
faqQuestions.a3: No, PDF Manipulator is a web-based application and requires an internet connection to function.
faqQuestions.q4: How do I report issues or request features?
faqQuestions.a4: You can contact our support team through the "Help" section or email us at support@pdfmanipulator.com.
faqQuestions.a5: Yes, we offer a RESTful API for programmatic access to all PDF manipulation features. See the API Documentation for details.

api.title: PDF Manipulator API
api.authDetails: Our API uses API keys for authentication. You can generate an API key in your account settings.

errors.notFoundDesc: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
